title: Star Wars Model Schema
description: Base Type for all Star Wars Models

Uris.description: An array of uri key value pairs applicable to the model

items.description: A Key Value Pair representing the type of uri and the uri itself

Key.description: The key representing the type of uri. See 'Domain.Utils.Keys' for values

Uri.description: The Uri. Relative uri's will be given a base uri of the api
